summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4351 for the improvement of West 54th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51552, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
